Sentence: Robert Jordan and Maria are immediately drawn to each other
That night, Maria comes out to join Robert Jordan as he (Jordan) sleeps outside
On the way back to Pablo's camp, Robert Jordan and Maria make love in the forest
Later that night, Maria comes outside to sleep with Robert Jordan again
Maria again joins Robert Jordan in his (Jordan) sleeping bag that night, and they fantasize about their future life in Madrid
Knowing that he (Jordan) must be left behind, Robert Jordan says goodbye to Maria, saying that he (Jordan) will be with her (Maria) even if she (Maria) goes
